verbs.description: [ARG0: An American federal judge] [V: rejected] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: a request by President Donald Trump 's former personal lawyer for a gag order to stop the attorney for adult film actress Stormy Daniels insulting him and talking about the case in media appearances] .
